Posts.Content: Hi everyone. My girlfriend was put on tamoxafin when she finished her treatment last February. (Mastectomy chemo radiotherapy). Last week her ongologist changed her med to Latrozole. He did a blood test to make sure she was post menaposal first which she was due to the chemo. Does anyone of you nice and resilient ladies  know why  Thank you  Our ongologist doesn't say much
Posts.Title: Tamoxafin Letrozole
